Content: This is a test document for Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG). RAG is a powerful technique that enhances large language models (LLMs) by grounding them in specific knowledge.
It works by retrieving relevant information from a database and using it to inform the LLM's responses. This makes the LLM more accurate, reliable, and context-aware.
RAG's applications are diverse. One of the prominent ones is question answering system. The system can improve its accuracy and relevance. RAG allows user to use its own data.
With RAG's ability to learn from external knowledge bases, it will become more powerful. RAG is also helpful to provide source of the information.
This is an example of how RAG work in the model. More document will be added later.
